function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory infections via droplet, contact, and airborne routes","Impact":"High potential for rapid spread of COVID-19 and other respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, promoting hand hygiene, and using personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation systems, touchless fixtures, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Indoor occupants, healthcare workers, and general public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of direct empirical evidence on airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Misguided health policy decisions and public response","Mitigation":"Conducting studies on airborne transmission, improving knowledge dissemination, and updating guidelines","Technologies":"Air sampling devices, particle counters, and respiratory simulation models","People":"Public health researchers and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic and pre-symptomatic transmission of the virus","Impact":"Undetected spread of COVID-19 among individuals","Mitigation":"Promoting testing, contact tracing, and public awareness","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, PCR tests, and digital contact tracing apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers, and government"}]}
